name: Shift
description: It's a fun puzzle game. You have to connect as many figures as possible together. Use yellow "shifters" to change direction of the line. Get more points for longer line.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo E4500 2.20 GHz or Athlon X2 7450 2.40 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB of VRAM and DX9 support DirectX: Version 9.0c
